group.label: Set Observe (pw) Pulse Width or Flip Angle

group.show: if (hs='y' or hs='yy' or hs='ny' or hs='yn') then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=0 endif

entry.show: on('hdwshimlist'):$e if $e<-0.5 then $VALUE=-1 else if (hdwshimlist='') or (hdwshim='n') then $VALUE=0 else $VALUE=1 endif endif

label.label: Last FID in Array to be stored

textmessage.set: if dsp='i' then $VALUE='In-Line DSP' else $VALUE='' endif

textmessage.label: Hardware DSP
textmessage.set: if dsp='r' then $VALUE='Hardware DSP' else $VALUE='' endif

entry.show: if (dsp='n') then $VALUE=-1 else if filtfile='' then $VALUE=0 else $VALUE=1 endif endif

label.label: Plot When Acquisition Finishes (in automation mode)
(These values are correct for last acquired FID immediately after "ft" or "wft")
